title: DaleyEdster
author: DaleyEdster
content: Valhalla $500 VIP Card GiveawayTo celebrate the upcoming mint of 888 Valhalla NFTs on 8th August 2023 we are giving you the chance to win one of 3 prizes!Prizes1 x Gold VIP Card1 x Silver VIP Card1 x Bronze VIP CardEach VIP Card will entitle you to a percentage of all NFT minting proceeds as below:-Gold VIP Card – 1% of minting proceedsSilver VIP Card – 0.5% of minting proceedsBronze VIP Card – 0.25% of minting proceedsHow to enter:1) Enter the Gleam Campaign here -  https://gleam.io/competitions/cBr9K-valhalla-nft-giveaway 2) Complete the required tasks.3) If you have entered Crypto Dragons Den giveaways before you will be entitled to loyalty bonus entriesDuration of the Campaign: – 9th July – 30th July 2023.Announcement of winners: – 31st July 2023 on the Valhalla Discord and Twitter channel=======================================================Learn more about ValhallaWebsite:  https://valhallaproject.club/ Discord:  https://discord.gg/FW83ugDnDf Twitter: https://twitter.com/888ValhallaPlease do not post your referral links or proof of participation on Bitcointalk. If you have questions, go to the Valhalla Discord.
